For most adolescents (~60%), smartphone use does *not* affect self-esteem.

For some, there are relevant negative effects (~20%), and for some positive ones (~15%).

Data: 387 adolescents from Netherlands, 34.930 observations. Great work from @IrenevanDriel & @UvA_AWeSome! #ica21 https://t.co/T3DfR4pShK

Another #ica21 recommendation for narrative persuasion researchers: Experience of Emotional Shifts in Narrative Persuasion. Winkler, @AppelMarkus, Schmidt and Richter had some interesting ideas about how to measure emotional shifts. https://t.co/UeM0y14QgX

(1/3) After watching interesting presentations from so many communication scholars at #ica21, attending, and organizing a Mobile Comm Global South Networking by @ICA_Mobile div. I have one observation directed particularly to scholars from the Global South and that is: (1/3)

#ica21 My takeaway after five years of ICA ⤵️

~Offline congress~
✅ All the feels!
✅ Motivating sense of community
✅ Great travel adventures
✅ Put faces to names
❌ "Argh, which panel to choose"
❌ CO² 🛩
❌ Post-talk Q&As tend to be a bit shallow
❌ Expenses/Accessibility
